title: Dynabook updates Tecra A40 and A50 with 12th-gen Intel P-series processors
content:
Dynabook has announced upgraded versions of the Tecra A40 and A50 laptops for 2022, featuring Intel’s 12th-generation P-series processors. The new laptops come with up to an Intel Core i7-1280P processor with vPro support, which includes 14 cores – six P cores and eight E cores. There are various configurations available with different Core i5

The post Dynabook updates Tecra A40 and A50 with 12th-gen Intel P-series processors appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Dynabook has announced the latest refresh of its Tecra A40 and A50 laptops, now featuring Intel's 12th-generation P-series processors.
